title: Having trouble ID'ing this font.
content:
Hey guys, I am in need of locating this font, any help is greatly appreciated.

Thanks

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010185322im_/http:/typophile.com/files/wtf_6516.jpg)
author: retoid

comments.content:
This is **CK Journaling** from Porch Swing Publishing (1999) and I think it's included in this font package from Broderbund:  
 [http://www.broderbund.com/p-47-clickart-fonts.aspx](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010185322/http:/www.broderbund.com/p-47-clickart-fonts.aspx "http://www.broderbund.com/p-47-clickart-fonts.aspx")  
Your sample seems a bit artificially emboldened and slanted

------------------  
I found it using "Find my Font": [http://www.findmyfont.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20131010185322/http:/www.findmyfont.com/ "http://www.findmyfont.com")
Oh thank you very much! You are a life saver. :)
